      • serialize

        public static java.lang.String serialize(ICatanCommand command)
                                  throws CommandSerializationException
        Serializes a command so it can be stored or transmitted
        Parameters:
        command - The command to serialize
        Returns:
        A string containing a JSON-formatted representation of the command
        Throws:
        CommandSerializationException - if something prevented the command from being serialized.

      • deserialize

        public static ICatanCommand deserialize(java.lang.String input)
                                 throws org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                                        CommandSerializationException
        Deserializes a command that was previously serialized
        Parameters:
        input - The JSON-formatted string
        Returns:
        An ICatanCommand with the same data as was represented by the JSON
        Throws:
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - if the input is not valid JSON
        CommandSerializationException - if something else prevented the command from being deserialized
